New Records: Aaron Civale threw seven shutout innings, his longest since July, lowering his ERA to 4.59 and improving to 3-1 with a 1.45 ERA in his five starts with the Brewers; Jackson Chourio hit his 20th double of the season
Key Match Events: Aaron Civale allowed only four baserunners over 92 pitches and struck out seven; Garrett Mitchell homered for his third of the season; Jackson Chourio doubled twice to drive in runs; Aaron Ashby retired all six batters he faced over the final two innings, striking out three
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers improved to 77-56 with a four-game series beginning Friday morning against the Reds; the game started at 1:10 p.m. and was broadcasted on Bally Sports Wisconsin and AM-620 radio
